modName: Eddard Stark Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My own version of Eddard from the tv series
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#7F6000] [size=5][b]EDDARD[/b][/size][b][size=5] STARK Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/size][/b][/color][/center][b][size=5]

[/size][center][size=5][size=3]Ned is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
[color=#3c78d8]HIGLY RACCOMANDED: WIC CLOAKS by Nivea here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?[/color]
(i have no permission to use in mod..)
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Steel Sword.
Location : Dragonsreach Whiterun
Combat Style : Warrior 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4][color=#980000]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU![/color]
[color=#3c78d8]HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?[/color]
